analysis.description:
Reentrancy in DecentralizedExchanges.purchase (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#262-294):
	External calls:
	- SpecialERC20(info.token).transfer(msg.sender,tradeAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol)
	- ERC20(info.token).transfer(msg.sender,tradeAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - total) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#291-294)
	- info.owner.transfer(total) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- orderInfos (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol)

Reentrancy in DecentralizedExchanges.sell (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#218-261):
	External calls:
	- SpecialERC20(info.token).transfer(info.owner,tradeAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#255-256)
	- ERC20(info.token).transfer(info.owner,tradeAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#256-258)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(total) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#251)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- orderInfos (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#259)

SpecialERC20 (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#127-130) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#128-130)

DecentralizedExchanges.cancelOrder (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#186-217) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(info.token).transfer(msg.sender,remain) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#199-200)

DecentralizedExchanges.sell (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#218-261) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(info.token).transfer(info.owner,tradeAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#256-258)

DecentralizedExchanges.purchase (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol#262-294) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(info.token).transfer(msg.sender,tradeAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xd4cd7c881f5ceece4917d856ce73f510d7d0769e.sol)
